text: "Careless Whisper" is a 1984 song by the English singer George Michael and is taken from the Wham!'s album Make It Big. The song features a saxophone solo by Steve Gregory. It went to number 1 in almost 25 countries. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Wham! songs Category:George Michael songs Category:Bananarama songs Category:Train songs Category:Julio Iglesias songs
title: Careless Whisper
